link.title: Ghana News Agency | Ghana's preferred news source: Accurate, Credible, Objective, Timely

meta.name: description
meta.content: Ghana News Agency is Ghana's preferred source of news. The News Agency’s core mandate is to collect, process, and disseminate authentic and unbiased news about Ghana and beyond.
Ghana News Agency | Ghana's preferred news source: Accurate, Credible, Objective, Timely
Ghana News Agency is Ghana's preferred source of news. The News Agency’s core mandate is to collect, process, and disseminate authentic and unbiased news about Ghana and beyond.
